definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: "Serotype" is a term used to describe the structure of the adeno-associated virus.
sentences.chinese: “輪狀病毒”是用來描述腺相關病毒結構的一個術語。

sentences.english: Some people say that it is Smecta rotavirus adsorption can try.
sentences.chinese: 有人說思密達是可以吸附輪狀病毒的，可以試試。

sentences.english: There are many different strains of rotavirus.
sentences.chinese: 輪狀病毒分許多不同的病毒株。

sentences.english: The new rotavirus was unidentified by hyperimmune sera of chimpanzee against Norwalk virus in C…
sentences.chinese: 故證明這是一種新的輪狀病毒。

sentences.english: The receptor for bovine rotavirus has existed on the cell surface of the tracheal mucous membrane of neonatal bovine.
sentences.chinese: 新生牛氣管粘膜細胞表面有牛輪狀病毒受體存在。

sentences.english: Rotavirus vaccination isn't usually available on the NHS.
sentences.chinese: 輪狀病毒疫苗接種通常在英國國民保險不提供。

sentences.english: Fortunately, it's rare for rotavirus to cause death among babies and children in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 有幸，在英國嬰兒和兒童由輪狀病毒引起的死亡罕見。

sentences.english: Rotavirus is one of the major cause of the viral gastroenteritis throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 輪狀病毒是世界範圍內流行性胃腸炎暴發的重要病因。

sentences.english: Even so, it admits that most children will have been infected by rotavirus by the age of 5.
sentences.chinese: 既便如此，在5歲多數兒童已受輪狀病毒感染。

sentences.english: But rotavirus can cause very unpleasant vomiting and diarrhoea.
sentences.chinese: 但輪狀病毒能引起嚴重嘔吐和腹瀉。

sentences.english: Stool rotavirus antigen in the QWBZG group became negative more quickly than the controlled group.
sentences.chinese: 大便輪狀病毒抗原轉陰率亦高於對照組。

definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
